text:
The ex wife of DJ Coffee in court papers demands a staggering R177 820K per month, just to get by!
And Coffee, claims Mbali is wrong to purport they were married in community of property. The DJ claims her perception that he's wealthy is wrong, as he has been affected by Covid-19
